text: Men Ajlikom () is a 2015 Lebanese biblical drama film directed by Carmelite Fr. Charles Sawaya and stars Chadi Haddad as Jesus Christ in the first drama film directed by Sawaya after he had entered the monastery. The film had its theatrical premiere on March 26, 2015, in Dbayeh. ==Plot== According to the Christian belief, Jesus Christ was sent by God the Father to carry the humans woes. Thus the film starts by showing the pain of humans occurring at the same time with the sufferings of Jesus. ==Cast== * Chadi Haddad as Jesus Christ * Mirana Neeymeh * Nada Saybeh * Georges Bassil ==Nomination== *2015, Nomination as Best Actor for Chadi Haddad at the 2015 International catholic film festival * 2015, Nomination as 'Best Short Film' at the 2015 International Catholic Film Festival. ==References== ==External links== Category:2015 films Category:2015 drama films Category:Lebanese films Category:Lebanese short films Category:Arabic-language films Category:Silent films Category:Biographical films about Jesus Category:Film portrayals of Jesus' death and resurrection Category:Portrayals of Jesus in film Category:Films shot in Lebanon Category:Films set in the 1st century Category:Portrayals of the Virgin Mary in film Category:Religious epic films
